trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects that represent the columns in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado objetos column que representam as colunas de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataGridColumnCollection collection to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column objects.
trans-unit.target: Usar a coleção de DataGridColumnCollection programaticamente para gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-coluna objetos derivados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: These objects represent the columns in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Esses objetos representam as colunas em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or insert columns in the DataGridColumnCollection collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar, remover ou colunas de inserção na coleção DataGridColumnCollection.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true,` the columns created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>estiver definida como `true,` as colunas criadas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>não foram adicionados ao controle o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle não armazena o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover uma coluna dinamicamente, você deve adicionar programaticamente ou remover a coluna sempre que a página for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control's state is reloaded and the control is rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: Forneça um `Page_Init` função que adiciona ou remove a coluna antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>estado do controle é recarregado e o controle será recriado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, as alterações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção não serão refletidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar quando ele for exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você possa adicionar colunas à programaticamente ou remover colunas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, é mais fácil listar as colunas estaticamente e, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>propriedade para exibir ou ocultar cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order of the columns in the collection determines the order that the columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: A ordem das colunas na coleção determina a ordem em que as colunas são exibidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different column classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista as classes de coluna diferente que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: |Column Class|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|A column that is bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Classe de coluna | Descrição | |------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>| Uma coluna que está associada a um campo em uma fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: Ele exibe cada item no campo como texto.

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|A column that displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o tipo de coluna padrão para o controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>| Uma coluna que exibe um botão de comando para cada item na coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as Add or Remove buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|A column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|A column that displays each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você crie uma coluna de controles de botão personalizado, como adicionar ou remover botões. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>| Uma coluna que contém a edição de comandos para cada item na coluna. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>| Uma coluna que exibe cada item na coluna como um hiperlink.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source, or to static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|A column that displays each item in the column according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo da coluna pode ser associado a um campo em uma fonte de dados ou em texto estático. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>| Uma coluna que exibe cada item na coluna de acordo com um modelo especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to control the content of the column, for example to display images.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class is the base class for the column classes listed.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você controle o conteúdo da coluna, por exemplo, para exibir imagens. | > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>classe é a classe base para as classes de coluna listado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: It is not used directly in the DataGridColumnCollection collection.
trans-unit.target: Ele não é usado diretamente na coleção DataGridColumnCollection.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control that corresponds with this collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle que corresponde a esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that stores the collection of columns.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> que armazena a coleção de colunas.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna ao final do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object to the end of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna ao final de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle não armazena o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover uma coluna dinamicamente, você deve adicionar programaticamente ou remover a coluna de cada vez que a página for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Forneça um `Page_Init` função que adiciona ou remove a coluna antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pode recarregar seu estado e se reconstruir.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, as alterações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção não serão refletidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar quando ele for exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você possa adicionar colunas à programaticamente ou remover colunas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, é mais fácil listar as colunas estaticamente e, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>propriedade para exibir ou ocultar cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna para acrescentar ao <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object at the specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para inserir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna no local do índice especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle não armazena o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover uma coluna dinamicamente, você deve adicionar programaticamente ou remover a coluna de cada vez que a página for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Forneça um `Page_Init` função que adiciona ou remove a coluna antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pode recarregar seu estado e se reconstruir.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, as alterações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção não serão refletidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar quando ele for exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você possa adicionar colunas à programaticamente ou remover colunas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, é mais fácil listar as colunas estaticamente e, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>propriedade para exibir ou ocultar cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column.
trans-unit.target: O local de índice no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> no qual inserir o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to insert in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado da coluna a ser inserida no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: column is .
trans-unit.target: columnis .

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-objetos de coluna de derivados o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para remover todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-objetos de coluna de derivados o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> property is automatically set to `0` after this method is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>propriedade é definida automaticamente como `0` depois que esse método é usado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Copia os itens a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado no <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O `array` parâmetro deve ser <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> com base em zero

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: A primeira posição do <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> para receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de colunas a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para determinar o número de colunas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada ao fazer a iteração pela coleção para determinar o limite superior da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface que contém todos os a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado objetos de coluna no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para criar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>interface que pode ser iteração facilmente para obter cada item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>apontada propriedade para obter o item atualmente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador para a posição inicial.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> object, or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método deve ser chamado depois de criar um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>de objeto, ou depois de usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador para o primeiro item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado objetos de coluna no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index number of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para determinar o número de índice especificada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object is not found, an index of `-1` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-objeto de coluna derivada não for encontrado, um índice de `-1` é retornado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado da coluna a ser pesquisado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice especificada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado de coluna a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived object is not found.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>, que indica que o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-objeto derivado não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as colunas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção pode ser gravada em todos os casos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção é sincronizada (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>classe e é substituído para sempre retornar `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção no índice especificado usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado de coluna a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> para recuperar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado de coluna a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para remover especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna de uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle não armazena o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover uma coluna dinamicamente, você deve adicionar programaticamente ou remover a coluna sempre que a página for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Forneça um `Page_Init` função que adiciona ou remove a coluna antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pode recarregar seu estado e se reconstruir.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, as alterações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção não serão refletidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar quando ele for exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você possa adicionar colunas à programaticamente ou remover colunas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, é mais fácil listar as colunas estaticamente e, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>propriedade para exibir ou ocultar cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado da coluna a ser removida do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivados do objeto de coluna do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para remover um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derivados do objeto de coluna de uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>coleção no índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle não armazena o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção no estado de exibição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover uma coluna dinamicamente, você deve adicionar programaticamente ou remover a coluna de cada vez que a página for atualizada.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Forneça um `Page_Init` função que adiciona ou remove a coluna antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pode recarregar seu estado e se reconstruir.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, as alterações para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção não serão refletidas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controlar quando ele for exibido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Embora você possa adicionar colunas à programaticamente ou remover colunas do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, é mais fácil listar as colunas estaticamente e, em seguida, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>propriedade para exibir ou ocultar cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-derivado de coluna a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: index is less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que ou maior que .

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade SyncRoot, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção de controle de alterações seus estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: O membro IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>interface.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> objeto acompanhar suas alterações de estado de exibição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado salvo anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém os valores de estado de exibição salvo para o controle.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing state changes.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto que contém as alterações de estado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém os valores de estado de exibição salvo para o controle.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Starts tracking state changes.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o controle de alterações de estado.
